contentrichtext.text: '''Heiligenbeil''' was a subcamp of the [[Nazi Germany|German]] [[Nazi Concentration Camp|concentration camp]] [[Stutthof concentration camp|Stutthof]] near [[Gdansk|Danzig]]. It was named after the [[East Prussia]]n town Heiligenbeil (now [[Mamonovo]], [[Russia]]). == External links == *[http://www.keom.de/denkmal/suche_lager_anzeig.php?lager_id%5B%5D=1198&lager_id%5B%5D=1199&submit.x=93&submit.y=3&submit=auswaehlen Keom.de] {{de icon}} {{coord missing|Poland}} [[Category:Nazi concentration camps in Poland]] {{Holocaust-stub}}
